title: Habib Mall E-Commerce Platform
shortDescription: Complete digital platform integrating 50+ shops with real-time inventory, checkout, and analytics dashboard.
fullDescription: We transformed Habib Mall's entire sales operation from traditional phone-based ordering into a sophisticated e-commerce ecosystem. The platform integrates 50+ independent shops, provides real-time inventory management, multi-payment options, and a powerful admin dashboard for operations management.
challenge: The mall relied on direct communication and in-store shopping, resulting in lost sales opportunities and difficulty for customers to browse products from home. There was no digital presence despite the market shifting strongly toward online shopping.
solution: We built a complete e-commerce platform that displays all products with filtering by price, color, size, and type. Implemented a smooth checkout process, real-time inventory tracking, and a comprehensive dashboard for managing orders, products, and analytics across all shops.

clientTestimonial.quote: They transformed our outdated system into a cutting-edge platform. Within months, we saw a 300% increase in sales and significantly reduced operational overhead. The professionalism and expertise are unmatched.

title: Global Payment System
shortDescription: Secure payment processing system handling millions of transactions across multiple currencies.
fullDescription: Built a high-performance payment gateway supporting 150+ countries with multi-currency processing, fraud detection, and real-time settlement. Processes millions of transactions daily with 99.99% uptime.
challenge: Existing payment systems were slow, unreliable, and couldn't scale for global transactions. High transaction failures and customer complaints about processing times.
solution: Architected a distributed payment processing system with redundancy across multiple data centers. Implemented advanced fraud detection using machine learning, multi-currency support, and optimized routing for instant settlement.

title: Analytics Dashboard
shortDescription: Real-time analytics platform processing terabytes of data with interactive visualizations.
fullDescription: A comprehensive analytics platform that aggregates data from multiple sources, provides real-time insights, and powers business intelligence for enterprise clients.
challenge: Manual data reporting was time-consuming and delayed decision-making. No real-time visibility into key metrics.
solution: Built a distributed data pipeline processing millions of events daily. Created interactive dashboards with custom visualizations, real-time alerts, and predictive analytics capabilities.

title: Mobile App Platform
shortDescription: Cross-platform mobile solution with 5M+ downloads and 4.8-star rating.
fullDescription: Built a high-performance mobile application available on iOS and Android, supporting millions of active users with offline functionality and real-time synchronization.
challenge: Fragmented user experience across platforms, poor performance, and high crash rates.
solution: Implemented cross-platform development with React Native, optimized performance, integrated robust backend systems, and established comprehensive testing and monitoring.
